name: Senior Business Analyst (OSS)
description:
Since 1993, Netcracker Technology has been developing and implementing unique IT solutions for more than 250 customers worldwide, mostly telecom providers. We create dozens of innovative products and lead the global market of BSS/OSS solutions ready to be used in the cloud environment. Our comprehensive portfolio of software solutions and professional services enables large-scale digital transformations, unlocking the cloud's opportunities, virtualization, and the changing mobile ecosystem.

We are currently looking for a Senior Business Analyst

Why join our team:

  • Work on design, development, and customization of mission-critical solutions to world-leading telecom companies;
  • Implement and support innovative technologies such as 5G, eSIM, Internet access by satellites in low Earth orbit, IoT, etc.;
  • Get unlimited opportunities for professional and career development in a global company.

What you’ll do:

  • Identifying, Collecting, Clarifying and Organizing Functional Requirements for new Product and Solution Features and Change Requests;
  • Development of System Use Cases and Information Model for Service, Network and Resource Management Domain of OSS/BSS Products;
  • Design of object model, user interface, data processing algorithms, integration interfaces, etc.;
  • Product Configuration according to customer’s requirements;
  • Supporting of implementation teams with expertise in OOB product capabilities;
  • Best Practice gathering and propagation in pre-sale processes;
  • Participating in the analysis, design and acceptance stages on prototype, proof-of-concept, product and implementation projects;
  • Gap analysis and New User Scenarios Creation for OOB Solutions in the area of Network Planning, Design, Build-out, Maintenance, Upgrade and Decommissioning, Service Order Management and Fulfilment;
  • Customer’s business needs verification and existing Products and Solutions Improvements;
  • Conducting market and technology researches in the telecommunications industry, learning standards in OSS/BSS or/and SDN/NFV;
  • Participating in new NetCracker modules and components development.

What we are looking for:

Must have:

  • Strong Analytical Skills;
  • Excellent skills in object-oriented design (generalization, classification, decomposition, correlation, unification, decision tables);
  • University technical degree(maths, physics, IT, telecommunications);
  • Experience from 3 years in development and implementation of software products (preferably for Telco recommended) in role of System Analyst or Business Analyst;
  • Understanding of network architecture, functionality and one or several processes from the following - design, deployment, configuration, maintenance, provisioning processes for IP/MPLS Networks, Packet Optical Network, Radio access network, LTE core network;
  • Knowledge of UML or other OO language for Info/Data Modeling and experience in the application of modeling tools.

Nice to have:

  • Knowledge in field of relational data bases, SQL or python;
  • Understanding of OSS/BSS and telco standards - TMF, TMN, ETSI, ITU, 3GPP, IETF;
  • Understanding of one of the following protocols nice to have: SNMP, CLI, FTP/SFTP, OSS-J, REST, OpenFlow, NETCONF, YANG;
  • Understanding of software development lifecycle (RUP, Agile, etc);
  • Good technical English writing skills;
  • Experience in network engineering.

We offer:

  • Competitive salary;
  • Medical insurance, covering dental services and online consultations with doctors;
  • More than 300 hard and soft-skills programs by the corporate career development center;
  • Open environment and encouraging knowledge sharing culture;
  • Free English courses and opportunity to practice foreign languages daily;
  • Flexible working hours and an opportunity to work remotely.
